# Save as csv

```{r}
dossier_temp <- tempfile(pattern = "saveascsv")
dir.create(dossier_temp)

save_as_csv(df = data_demo_squirrels, path = file.path(dossier_temp, "monfichier.csv"))

unlink(dossier_temp, recursive = TRUE)
```
